attributes.action: Keep the BBC Licence fee, or guarantee equivalent independent funding
attributes.additional_details: The BBC is a great national institution that draws the country together in an ever more divisive world, and that guarantees independence and balance of news in a world ever more filled with fake news.  It is the envy of the world and the greatest ambassador this country has.  We all need the BBC and we can't have the Government kill it (or reduce it to a shadow of its former self) by taking away its national, independent funding source.
attributes.background: Keep the BBC licence fee beyond 2027, or fund the BBC to a similar level to now in a way that is independent of Government

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606445
